texto: 5.4.2 Initiation, identification and documentation o f the need for change A change can be initiated by the organization, by a customer, or by an external provider. Prior to submission for evaluation to the dispositioning authority (see 4.2), all change proposals should be identified and retained as documented in formation. Change proposals should typically include the following in formation: a) configuration item(s) and related in formation to be changed, including details o f their title(s) and current revision status; b) a description o f the proposed change; c) details o f other configuration items or in formation that can be a ffected by the change; d) the interested party preparing the
